learning_outcomes: Master Impersonal and Causative Passives at CAE level
Expand vocabulary in Reports and Statements
Enhance stylistic precision and register awareness

content.prompt_es: Transforma a la forma impersonal pasiva:
content.stimulus_en: People say he is a genius. -> He is ______ to be a genius.

content.prompt_es: Completa con la forma causative passive:
content.stimulus_en: The CEO had his speech ______ (write) by a professional ghostwriter.
